channel.title: Im new to this, be gentle please!
channel.description:
Ok so i have downloaded a source and client (to get my RS fix at work, shhh don't tell my boss!). Everything is great except the banks don't work, the objects are there but clicking on them does nothing. How do i get this to work. Its a 317 if that helps. I have no intention of releasing this BTW its just for my pleasure!
Thanks
Dukey

item.title: Im new to this, be gentle please!
item.dc:creator: @cleako cleako
item.description:
@cleako wrote:

Incorrect section. This is Runescape Classic, not 317 RS2.

Read full topic
item.source: Im new to this, be gentle please!

item.title: Im new to this, be gentle please!
item.dc:creator: @Jarvistude Jarvistude
item.description:
@Jarvistude wrote:

Hi Dukey, can you provide a tiny bit more information about the server you have, thanks the revision number but there are still some differences in servers.

Do you have any knowledge on Java as you will have to add a case in the objects file for the interaction you are trying to make.

If you want a working server to just play on you should probably find a different source as the one you picked up sounds quite incomplete.
Dragon-Age was recently released which is a 317 which has a lot of working features already.

Kind Regards
Jarvis

Read full topic
